Write fasta format data to disk

Source: R/get_fasta.R
write_fasta.Rd

Write fasta format data to disk

write_fasta(df, out_path, header_col = "header", seq_col = "seq",
  gz = FALSE)

Arguments

df

dataframe containing header and sequence for fasta
out_path

filename for output fasta records
header_col

column name containing header
seq_col

column name containing sequences
gz

use [R.utils::gzip] to compress output and add `.gz` suffix

Contents

  • Arguments
